casebody.data:
No. 761. United States ex rel. Brensilber et al. v. Bausch & Lomb Optical Co. et al. May 3, 1943. Mr. Homer Cummings for petitioners. Mr. Whitney North Seymour for the *734Bauseh & Lomb Optical Co. et al.; and Mr. Raymond M. White for Carl Zeiss, Inc., — respondents. Solicitor General Fahy and Assistant Attorney General Tom C. Clark filed a brief on behalf of the United States, as amicus curiae, in support of the petition.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
